name: godot
description: A MCP server providing comprehensive Godot engine integration for project editing, debugging, and scene management.

tools.name: launch_editor
tools.description: Launch Godot editor for a specific project

tools.name: run_project
tools.description: Run the Godot project and capture output

tools.name: get_debug_output
tools.description: Get the current debug output and errors

tools.name: stop_project
tools.description: Stop the currently running Godot project

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: List Godot projects in a directory

tools.name: get_project_info
tools.description: Retrieve metadata about a Godot project

tools.name: create_scene
tools.description: Create a new Godot scene file

tools.name: add_node
tools.description: Add a node to an existing scene

tools.name: load_sprite
tools.description: Load a sprite into a Sprite2D node

tools.name: export_mesh_library
tools.description: Export a scene as a MeshLibrary resource

tools.name: save_scene
tools.description: Save changes to a scene file

tools.name: get_uid
tools.description: Get the UID for a specific file in a Godot project (for Godot 4.4+)

tools.name: update_project_uids
tools.description: Update UID references in a Godot project by resaving resources (for Godot 4.4+)

prompts.name: Launch Godot Editor

prompts.text: Launch the Godot editor for my project at /path/to/project
